legislation.title: Clean Water and Air Act of 2024
legislation.summary: The Clean Water Act of 2024 aims to protect and improve the quality of water resources by regulating pollutants, promoting sustainability, and providing funding for environmental programs.

section.title: Section 1: Short Title
section.text: This Act may be cited as the "Clean Water Act of 2024".

section.title: Section 2: Findings and Purpose
section.text: The Congress finds that water is a critical resource for public health, agriculture, and industry. This Act aims to ensure safe and clean water for all citizens.

section.title: Section 3: Prohibited Activities
section.text: No person may discharge pollutants into navigable waters without a permit issued under this Act.
